website_summaries.verdict: With a dicing kit, 2 different sized work bowls and enough discs and blades to need a storage container, it's hard to imagine needing anything else.
pros: ExactSlice System allows external thickness adjustment
Seal has locking system with leak-resistant ring
Includes multiple blades and discs and storage case
cons: Food can get stuck in the hollow underneath the blade

customer_reviews.title: Excellant Warranty from KitchenAid
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of KitchenAid products. After my experience with the warranty department, I am even more so. I purchased this item in November of 2017 and used it frequently. Unfortunately, there was an issue that prevented an attachment from being removed from the base. There wasn't a question about replacing the item. I received the replacement processor in less than a week, along with a FedEx return label. Very happy to have my favorite food processor back i my kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon H.

customer_reviews.title: Too finicky to be useful, poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: The locking mechanism is so finicky that this mixer only runs 1 out if 10 tries, and even then requires theee hands to hold the lid latch tight and the bowl match tight and to push the button. In trying g to get a replacent part to see if it's just mine, but although I did talk to someone at customer service, they have failed to respond to the email they told me to send.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Bundy Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box and straight into wrapping paper, it wasn’t until after the holidays that I found out that it never powered on. An easy to follow troubleshooting guide helped my family decide to call it in. (Nothing worked) Since KA is on Eastern time, we waited until the following Monday to call. Shortly after getting someone on the line, (around 10 minutes and some hold music) we were told we’d be sent a replacement after verifying our information. About a week and a half, we were sent a replacement and boy howdy, it’s been hard at work ever since. With almost daily use, this has been an efficient upgrade and are happy with the processor. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Commander Vega

customer_reviews.title: ... system and Dicing kit it was divered and pack nice in 3 boxes we put it togeather and start ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought the kitchenaid14 cup processor exac slice system and Dicing kit it was divered and pack nice in 3 boxes we put it togeather and start using it the Dicing kit work s great it good for all vegetable I even chop my salad fixing now I can slice and dice quick watch your fingers very sharp best processor ever had Amazon has the best price and divert fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this less than 3 months ago. I am not happy with it. When you process some foods, the foods get caught under the blades and don't process uniformly. One of the plastic pieces came off while processing. I managed to put it back in place and am still using it, but I think I'm going to contact the company for a product exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT (only issue is power buttons hard to work)
customer_reviews.text: AWESOME!!! This works great ~ only issue we had was using the power buttons as they’re hard to press and get to come on. Other then that this works great and the diving kit is amazing. Perfectly sliced potatoes makes for more even cooking as well. Great product but designers need to address buttons. I would definitely recommend this item and we have several KitchenAid product from refrigerator down and all work great.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Eckert

customer_reviews.title: Bulky and expensive, but does the job.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the dicing attachments. It chopped and puréed well. I am not a fan of the buttons, I prefer paddles. It was also difficult to put the lid on. You had to use both hands. The price was much higher than some of the similar brands. This also takes up a TON of space considering it comes with two giant containers of attachments. I liked the 2nd smaller bowl, but again, the entirety of the contents included was just too much. I prefer the cuisinart one. This was returned.
customer_reviews.author: S and C

customer_reviews.title: Well worth your money
customer_reviews.text: This processor is great !!!! The price is a little steep but it works and now days that is saying something.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ruks

customer_reviews.title: I was chopping everything by hand and it's wonderful. It's not going to replace prcise knife cuts ...
customer_reviews.text: It has saved me from getting tennis elbow. I was chopping everything by hand and it's wonderful. It's not going to replace prcise knife cuts but I'm using it to add veggies in largs batches of soups I make.
customer_reviews.author: Darin L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Sorry Hubby, This Guy is My New Cooking Buddy
customer_reviews.text: I love how sturdy the plastic components are and how well made this kitchen appliance is. This thing is easy to clean as long as you clean it right after you use it. I made an awesome Thai stew today and all of the veggies were sliced paper thin because I wanted to try something new. I love that you can adjust it from the outside with one swift movement. I can almost see through the carrot slices... pretty epic! A meal that would have taken me an hour to make instead took me 10 minutes from preparation to clean up. I'd say that this was a very nice investment indeed.
customer_reviews.author: Lunarshadoe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I’ve always been a KitchenAid fan and their products never disappoint me. The dicing and slicing features are a life saver. It’s very easy to use and clean. The only thing that’s been a little challenging is getting the lid on and off (super tight) but the more I use it, the easier it becomes so I would say the difficulty was simply because it was new and needed to be broken into; kind of like a good pair of shoes needing stretched.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best food processor  ever ....
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream ,and has made my time in the kitchen more enjoyable and efficient. Cut my prep time way down . The dicier cuts in perfect little cubes. The exact slice is great since It doesn't require different blades for different thicknesses. Very easy to use . The only drawback I see is some of the parts have small spaces that are hard to get into when washing, like the food feeder shoot . But a small brush will get to all of those parts .
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Clark

customer_reviews.title: I love the dicing part other than that it get stuck ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the dicing part other than that it get stuck no easy instructions, my bowl is not coming out of it the middile one strck out there struggling to remove it. This is not user friendly .
customer_reviews.author: Soumya Sagiri

customer_reviews.title: Great Appliance
customer_reviews.text: It was just what we were looking for and can be used in a variety of ways.
customer_reviews.author: Marie H.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This processor is excellent! I make soup every month or so and the dicing kit included with this processor makes the chore very easy and fast. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: ESB

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this KA food processor to my daughter for Christmas & we both love it—one of the best gifts ever !!!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Pontious

customer_reviews.title: Stops working in the middle of a function
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this 3 times and have had problems every time all the way up until tonight which was the last straw when trying to grate cheese. Almost immediately as the cheese touches the grater wheel the device shuts off. This item is way to expensive to have so many issues each time it it used.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: cdownam

customer_reviews.title: Dicing Magic!
customer_reviews.text: The dicing feature on this unit is nothing short of sorcery. It works perfectly. If only we had this before we harvested our vegetables from our garden that we chopped by hand to freeze. This would have saved us hours. The variable slicing utility is also very amazing and will slice paper thin if you want. The 14 cup feature is a must when doing anything around our house and coupled with the extra features it is worth every penny of the $300.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle

customer_reviews.title: Love it, Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it, Love it, Love it. Especially the dicing tool. The KitchenAid KFP is everything I had expected. This is a great machine
customer_reviews.author: Deborah H.

customer_reviews.title: Item was used and was not labeled as such.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item because it was obviously a previous return. Packaging was broken and the item was loose in the box. It showed wear and was obviously used.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I broke my old Oster and this one has a lot more it can do!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie D

customer_reviews.title: Love the dicer.
customer_reviews.text: It’s not as nice as my smaller one that I own but it’s OK
customer_reviews.author: Raven Loguidice

customer_reviews.title: Great Food Processor.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a food processor for the yearly canning, wife loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Koonce

customer_reviews.title: 14 cup KitchenAide food processor
customer_reviews.text: So far, I love my food processor. Have only used slicer, but worked great. Love the red looks great in my red kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen Aid Food Processor
customer_reviews.text: I find it easy to use easy to clean and I use it almost everyday and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It had way to many parts, took me 30min ...
customer_reviews.text: It had way to many parts,took me 30min to put it together to chop 10min worth of veggies.I did not have the patience for it
customer_reviews.author: michele jones

customer_reviews.title: If I bought it again, I'd get the 13 cup with the 3-1 wide mouth lid.
customer_reviews.text: This food processor has been awesome so far. I've used both the slicing disc and the shredding disc on my over abundance of summer squash from my garden. The lid is finicky, and if it doesn't start when you try it, I'd try the lid first. It takes a good bit to lock it on. If I were to buy it again though, I'd get the 13 cup processor with the 3-1 wide mouth lid. I didn't pay close enough attention to this one, and just assumed it also had it. The mouth is much smaller, and will require at least some cutting to use it. Otherwise, great!
customer_reviews.author: Patio Lover

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Food Processor
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Love having the additional smaller bowl. I have found it comes in very handy. Also love the dicing feature. I love making soup and this feature saves me so much time in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic food processor. Loads of attachments come with it in their own storage box.
customer_reviews.author: CLOVIA

customer_reviews.title: ... it only once but it seems to be a great machine. The parts all fit nicely together and ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used it only once but it seems to be a great machine. The parts all fit nicely together and it did a great job of dicing carrots for soup.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: large enough so you do not have to stop to empty the bowl

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Works great and so easy to keep all the part organized!

customer_reviews.title: I really love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I really love this thing! Very strong, doesn't leak, easy to clean, and has a nice storage box for all the attachments.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, practice and its really very pretty even for ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful, practice and its really very pretty even for decoration. It does everything what it says, and I strogly recomend it!!

customer_reviews.title: Great food processor.
customer_reviews.text: Great machine. Does everything I need it to and more.
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth Dodge

customer_reviews.title: A Beast that does the Best. Awesome Product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb product. The exact dicing mechanism is the best. Makes soft dough. I love the product.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its really good with Dicing kit saving lot of time. And cutting as expected.
customer_reviews.author: SREDDY

customer_reviews.title: Lots of food gets stuck above blade.
customer_reviews.text: It's powerful. It's fairly quiet given the size. Major drawback is that food gets stuck above the blade. I haven't played with it too much yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used it a few times so far. Meets my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: ram

customer_reviews.title: Kitchenaid is s great product. Recently ordered the 14 cup and when ...
customer_reviews.text: Kitchenaid is s great product. Recently ordered the 14 cup and when received was disappointed it was so big! Wished I had looked at one in the stores before I ordered. Only two people in our household so really needed at least a size smaller, will say again kitchenaid makes a quality product and has very good customer service, but this product is just too large for average household in my opinion. Also takes up a lot of countertop space
customer_reviews.author: Linda Berry

customer_reviews.title: Definite must have for any cook!
customer_reviews.text: This was actually purchased for my mother. Not sure that she's used it yet. However I had purchased one for myself before tjust before buying this one and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: AntKnee

customer_reviews.title: I just received April 26 2016 and opened the next ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received April 26 2016 and opened the next day today with my girlfriend to knows about these food processors, IT WILL NOT TURN ON! again IT WILL NOT TURN ON. .

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far. It was a Christmas present to my wife who uses it for semi-commercial kitchen applications and she loves it.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This was did not turn on when it arrived.. have to return it!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A very handle machine to have in the kitchen !

customer_reviews.title: bowls and lid was used, the rest appeared new
customer_reviews.text: The bowls and lid was used, was written on with magic marker and scratched from cleaning and no instructions. The machine and blades Appear to be new.
customer_reviews.author: Gene S

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work. The problem is live in Brazil and we will be back to Florida in 24 May for a short stay
customer_reviews.author: belo fortes

customer_reviews.title: It broke today. A little over 3 months after ...
customer_reviews.text: It broke today. A little over 3 months after purchase. I bake all the time but this is ridiculous. Why are products make so cheap these days. The price sure wasn't.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dicer is assume.. Chop vegetables for a soup in minutes.
customer_reviews.author: SUSAN CATLIN

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very noisey and not as powerful as lower cost Cuisinart.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works beautifully. Haven't used it too much yet
customer_reviews.text: Works beautifully. Haven't used it too much yet, but when I did, it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah  Hallman

customer_reviews.title: dissatisfied
customer_reviews.text: Product broke in the first month of use - chopping blade came apart during use and bowl locked on base making impossible to disassemble for cleaning and future use - return policy only 30 days!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L. Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Arrived to me in Western Australia with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Arrived to me in Western Australia with a USA power plug on it which meant that I had to purchase a step down transformer for an extra $100.00. It is so large and heavy doesn't come with the extra wide feeder lid on it.Very confusing to watch on u tube as every model seems to have different attachments.I bought this one so I could get the dicer.Would prefer the 13 cup if I was doing it all over again.. but would like the dicer to come with it and also the french fry disk.
customer_reviews.author: bon

customer_reviews.title: Horrible machine. I used the old machine for 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: Horrible machine . I used the old machine for 10 years but this one first wouldn't easily fit correctly and then the blade got stuck in the bowl and couldn't come out giving me numerous cuts ... Extremely disappointed ....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: I’d give this a zero rating if I was able. I use my food processor a lot. The lever To adjust thickness of slices stopped working after a few weeks. Kitchenaid replaced the machine. Not long after, something else happened and they offered no replacement. This Is not a strong machine and not meant for constant frequent use. I’m going back to cuisinart
customer_reviews.author: Chaya

customer_reviews.title: Great for slicing, shredding and general food processor use.  Dicing is OK, but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: We selected this machine after trying an expensive Breville model. It is great for slicing, shredding, and so on. Dicing is limited to one size which can be a problem if you want to make salsa. Also, you can only wash it in the upper rack of the dishwasher so it will take several loads to wash everything. Overall, very happy with this purchase and find it powerful and fast. Very happy with adjustable slicer.
customer_reviews.author: Woodworker and long time Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This food processor can do it all from small job needs to huge ones. However, recognize that the footprint size and storage needs for the machine is huge. Be sure you have the space to accommodate all the attachments and accessories. Allow yourself time to thoroughly review all of the manual sections and practice assembling it. If you do that...you wil love it, love it, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Carolna Lady405

customer_reviews.title: Extremely happy with this processor!
customer_reviews.text: Made my life so much easier! Excellent quality. I really like the ease of the external adjustable slicer. Makes slicing potatoes, carrots, cucumbers etc a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Beach lover

customer_reviews.title: Sprouted bread making
customer_reviews.text: For the most part it was wonderful. The down side was that when I was grinding sprouted wheat berries for bread and I put about three batches of berries in, one batch at a time, and the motor got hot so I had to take the time to let it cool. I guess this is the difference between a home model and a professional one.
customer_reviews.author: El

customer_reviews.title: Big work horse.
customer_reviews.text: Its big. Lots of components. Easy to use. Sliced tons of carrots(raw). Diced onions(raw) and beets(cooked). Wonderful. Easy to clean. Only two small drawbacks noted. Sometimes the whole unit vibrated and wanted to move across the counter. Had to hold it. Second, lots of whatever you were slicing or dicing was stuck in the rim of the top. Would be nice to have a tool that easily scrapped it out. I used a knife to clean it out. Otherwise, this saved me a lot of time to prepare my ton of garden veggies for the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: The dicer is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: When doing thick items, the unit vibrates so that i have to hold it down when doing hummus. It doesn't bother me though cuz I Love the dice factor. It's instant and works well with soft veggies like zucchini. Was not really functional on sweet potatoes.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: great food processor
customer_reviews.text: Be sure to read the instructions to use the right blade for the right type of food. Great and love the amount food it processes with ease. Simple yet effective and versatile.
customer_reviews.author: MATT

customer_reviews.title: Enter than advertised
customer_reviews.text: It’s great and comes with even more attachments and features than advertised . Highly recommend . Only down side is it doesn’t stick to the work top very well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Food Processor
customer_reviews.text: As with all KitchenAid food processors, it is powerful and well designed. My only complaint with this one is that it is more complicated to operate. This is my third KitchenAid food processor, and I've never had to read the user manual before using one before. This one I've had to read more than once to figure out how to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Amante dei Gatti

customer_reviews.title: Does not have the wide mouth feeder
customer_reviews.text: Careful. This does not have the wide mouth feeder that the 13 cup processor has.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Kilpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Watch qvc videos on how to use it.  Or kitchen aid you tubes.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product for homemade potato chips and any thickness scallopped potatoes with the exact slice feature. I actually bought this for my son and daughter-in-law for their Christmas present because I love mine. They have a garden and will use it for canning. Also bought the cheese blade and French fry blade in another purchase we’ll worth the price as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan C Barry

customer_reviews.title: I very Fast
customer_reviews.text: I bought the machine to mainly dice tomatoes and onions. It works so fast that I don't think it has time to properly dice the food. It may be great for firmer vegetables. I works great for all other food processing.
customer_reviews.author: ClaraA

customer_reviews.title: It does what it is supposed to do
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for the dicer kit. It does it great. On top, I also like the adjusting slicing blade. What I miss is a bigger feeding hole for whole tomatoes, for example. Overall, it well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Lomaestro

customer_reviews.title: Not the best I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of accessories and seems powerful, but it won't grate hard cheese, like Parmesan. My previous food processor would.). I'm keeping it but I wish it would grate Parmesan.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great processor
customer_reviews.text: Love the diving feature. Powerful and makes short work of my dicing and chopping.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen J. Kettle

customer_reviews.title: Shop Elsewhere!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give a NEGATIVE star, if it were possible!! The multipurpose blade breaks all the time. Save your money and shop elsewhere!!
customer_reviews.author: Sue S

customer_reviews.title: I love my new food processor
customer_reviews.text: I love my new food processor, but, I wished I had realized that the 14 cup processor does not have as many different attachments as the smaller 12 or 13 cup processor have. I was hoping that I could add different attachments to it for French fries and fine cheese grating, but that is not available for the 14 cup food processor. But, it works great, is very smooth and fits on my counter and under the cupboards, so I'm sure I will have it a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SandyBeach

customer_reviews.title: Best quality home processor
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Convenient and I do a lot of garlic spread and this one is the best. As for hummus, bean and garbanzo, it is good but not a pro.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi Ha

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and Red!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our elderly nutrition center......after we figured out to use it LOL this is going to be a great asset to the workers preparing the food. It was delivered on time and was not damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Faulkner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Does everything and more
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Does everything and more. The exact slice is so helpful. Not to mention the magic dicing kit, that I use often cooking soups. I also ordered the french fry disk by calling. KA has amazing customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Babybear

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: Ido tons of chopping and this has taken a three hour job down to one thanks Kitchen Aid! I love this!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth S. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Very, Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This is a fabulous machine. I had the much smaller version before, but doesn't compare to this behemoth. Nothing it can't do. I use it for making my very, very chunky gazpacho (which requires lots of chopping) and what used to take 35 minutes, now takes 5. Wow. And very well made.
customer_reviews.author: George17

customer_reviews.title: KitchenAid, a trusted brand at a good price
customer_reviews.text: A little challenging to learn all the options. I'm working my way through all the things it does.
customer_reviews.author: nelsoncohen

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful. Does exactly like it says
customer_reviews.text: This is a beast. Wonderful. Does exactly like it says. Love the dicing attachment. Does the work in just seconds. Sliced strawberries in such a short time I was amazed.
customer_reviews.author: Paulette

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best food processor I ever owned, it does everything.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Hayward

customer_reviews.title: I particularly like the cube maker and the variable thickness slicer - ...
customer_reviews.text: A little over engineered and takes too much shelf space, but works very well and full of (good) surprises. I particularly like the cube maker and the variable thickness slicer - both not available (to my knowledge) on food processors from other vompanies.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly G.

customer_reviews.title: A kitchen workhorse of superb quality
customer_reviews.text: I love, LOVE my new KitchenAid 14 C Food Processor. Comes with a separate, smaller bowl and blade--- this is a very useful feature, and it's like having two machines. I find that I use the smaller one quite a bit. Appreciate the low, high and pulse settings. You can also adjust the size of the slices on the slicing blade. NICE! A storage container holds all of the blades and attachments easily. It's sizable - easily 10 inches square with a pop up lid, so getting to the tools is easy. A quality, sturdy workhorse of a machine.
customer_reviews.author: Cook-E

customer_reviews.title: The best one...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing , just amazing.The Rolls Royce of the food processors. Thierry M . Ex Chef of the Royal Palaces of Jordan.
customer_reviews.author: Martine Miroir And Miroir

customer_reviews.title: Great for small items
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I diced several tomatoes (after freezing), some eggplant and squash; worked very well; love the large capacity bowl. Slicing potatoes was a bit of a disappointment as I had to cut the size down more than I wanted since the feed shoot is kinda small... almost like it is designed for foods not thicker than large carrots. In retrospect, I wish I had purchased the large mouth feeder
customer_reviews.author: fergsRus

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Use it almost daily
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Use it almost daily... at least the days I cook. Standing for long periods is out for this old lady (73)... eyesight not what it used to be so using this for dicing, shredding, slicing, etc. is a lifesaver.
customer_reviews.author: TessieLassie

customer_reviews.title: Jams a lot and only soft materials to dice
customer_reviews.text: Got this for dicing. It jams a lot and you can only use soft things to dice. Would return if I didn't have to pay for shipping
customer_reviews.author: nixen

customer_reviews.title: I hate to have a machine that doesn't do all the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am very upset with this machine. I bought it in July and the slicing disk quick working, have been use only two times. Any ideas, any suggestions??? I hate to have a machine that doesn't do all the tasks is suppose to do. and I paid the price for the cutting disk otherwise I could have bought a cheaper one. Please. help and is no available for a amazon refund or replacement. I don;t know who to contact. Next time I will buy something expensive maybe I should go to a local store.
customer_reviews.author: GRILLO

product_meta.title: KitchenAid KFP1466ER 14-Cup Food Processor with Exact Slice System and Dicing Kit - Empire Red
product_meta.description: Color:Empire RedKitchenAid 14-Cup Food Processor with Exact Slice System easily slices soft to hard foods with the optimized speeds, from thick to thin also includes commercial-style dicing kit. The 2-in-1 Ultra Wide Mouth Feed Tube accommodates a variety of sizes of food.
feature_bullets: Industry's First hands-free commercial-style dicing kit slices then dices for effortless processing.
The externally adjustable ExactSlice System features optimized speeds, and an external lever that allows you to go from thick to thin with one slide of the lever.
High, Low & Pulse speed options allow you to precisely and properly handle soft or hard ingredients with the touch of a button.
The 2-in-1 Feed Tube lets you use either the large or narrower opening during continuous slicing or shredding, depending on the size of the ingredients.
